name: CreateDatabaseUser
description:
Create a new database user and obtain an API key.

This tool is used to create a new database user by specifying a name. It returns an API key for the created user.

parameters.name: user_name
parameters.description: Specify the name for the new database user. It should be a string that identifies the user.

parameters.name: set_creation_time_experimental
parameters.description: EXPERIMENTAL: Set the given time as creation time. This will be removed in future versions.

value_schema.description: EXPERIMENTAL, DONT USE. THIS WILL BE REMOVED AGAIN. - set the given time as creation time

parameters.name: disable_import_experimental
parameters.description: Set to true to prevent importing an API key from a static user. Experimental and will be removed.

value_schema.description: EXPERIMENTAL, DONT USE. THIS WILL BE REMOVED AGAIN. - import api key from static user

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the weaviate API.

parameters.name: import
parameters.description: EXPERIMENTAL, DONT USE. THIS WILL BE REMOVED AGAIN. - import api key from static user

value_schema.description: EXPERIMENTAL, DONT USE. THIS WILL BE REMOVED AGAIN. - import api key from static user

parameters.name: createTime
parameters.description: EXPERIMENTAL, DONT USE. THIS WILL BE REMOVED AGAIN. - set the given time as creation time

value_schema.description: EXPERIMENTAL, DONT USE. THIS WILL BE REMOVED AGAIN. - set the given time as creation time
